org.apache.juneau

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Session
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanSession

    public abstract class Session
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A one-time-use non-thread-safe object that's meant to be used once and then thrown away.

    Serializers and parsers use session objects to retrieve config properties and to use it as a scratchpad during serialize and parse actions.

    See Also:
    PropertyStore

      • Session

        protected Session(Context ctx,
                  SessionArgs args)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context creating this session object. The context contains all the configuration settings for the session.
        args - Runtime arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        protected final ObjectMap getProperties()
        Returns the session-level properties.
        Returns:

      • getStringProperty

        public final String getStringProperty(String key)
        Returns the session property with the specified key.

        The order of lookup for the property is as follows:

        • Override property passed in through the constructor.
        • Property defined on the context object.
        • System.property.
        Parameters:
        key - The property key.
        Returns:
        The property value, or null if it doesn't exist.

      • getStringProperty

        public final String getStringProperty(String key,
                                      String def)
        Same as getStringProperty(String) but with a default value.
        Parameters:
        key - The property key.
        def - The default value if the property doesn't exist or is null.
        Returns:
        The property value.

      • addToCache

        public final void addToCache(String key,
                             Object val)
        Adds an arbitrary object to this session's cache.

        Can be used to store objects for reuse during a session.

        Parameters:
        key - The key. Can be any string.
        val - The cached object.

      • addToCache

        public final void addToCache(Map<String,Object> cacheObjects)
        Adds arbitrary objects to this session's cache.

        Can be used to store objects for reuse during a session.

        Parameters:
        cacheObjects - The objects to add to this session's cache. No-op if null.

      • getFromCache

        key - The session object key.
